meanings.definition: Capable of being inclined or tilted.
meanings.sent1: The chair was inclinable, allowing me to lean back comfortably.
meanings.sent2: The inclinable desk made it easier for me to work while standing.
meanings.sent3: The inclinable hat flew off in the wind, making me chase after it.
meanings.sent4: Her inclinable smile brightened up the room, tilting everyone's mood towards happiness.
meanings.sent5: The inclinable road twisted and turned, leading us through the scenic route.

meanings.definition: Willing or disposed to do something.
meanings.sent1: She was inclinable to help her friends whenever they needed assistance.
meanings.sent2: The inclinable student eagerly volunteered for the science experiment.
meanings.sent3: The inclinable puppy wagged its tail happily, ready to play fetch.
meanings.sent4: His inclinable nature to explore new places led him on exciting adventures.
meanings.sent5: The inclinable team members worked together harmoniously towards their common goal.
